Abstract: The 2nd year in a row, I have been a mentor at Google Summer of Code. This year, I am mentoring an Open Source Mobile App Project “Power Up” powered by Systers.

Period: Mai 2016 - September 2016

Skills Learnt: * iOS development in Swift * Unit Testing * Advanced Github Subversion Control * Project management * Time management * Team and leadership skills

Description: PowerUp is an educational choose-your-own-adventure game that utilizes a users uploaded curriculum to empower pre-adolescents to take charge of their reproductive health. This summer the project aimed at introducing the main game mechanics, e.g. implementing the avatar and a points-based reward system.

Resources:

  • Check out the code on Github.
  • What is Google Summer of Code ?
  • Who are Systers?

Feel free to contact me, if you are interested in contributing.
